title: Laundry Services
description: We provide the quality laundry services.
subtitle: We provide the best cleaning services.
subdesciption: The Nairobi Hospital boasts the largest laundry facility in East and Sub-Saharan Africa. Located at the Anderson Centre, it is equipped with state-of-the-art machinery, including a 12-chamber hygiene tunnel washer — the largest in Africa — barrier washers for handling infected or foul linen, stand-alone high-spin washers for customized laundry, and a wide assortment of finishing equipment and backup systems. The laundry not only processes linen but also provides holistic linen solutions to the entire hospital, its outlets, and external customers.
paragraph: Our team of experts who have been in the profession for years focuses on helping you achieve optimal oral health.
point3: Scheduled Laundry (e.g., Mon, Wed, Friday) or as agreed
benefits: The Benefits of using our laundry:
needs: Understanding of Current Needs (e.g., Infection Control)
equipments: Modern Equipment Allowing Customized Programs for Your Laundry Items, with Backup Available
team: A Dedicated Team Focused on Delivering Quality Service
process: The process we have been doing for over 20 years of service.
departments: The department's regulatory compliance is guaranteed. The design of our facility meets all the recommendations and requirements governing a healthcare laundry.
safetyofclients: The safety of our clients, hospital staff and patients is our number 1 priority, infection prevention starts with a clean environment.
laundry: “Laundry is one thing that is never noticed until it’s not done”.
proud: We are proud to partner with a variety of organizations to provide the best laundry services possible. Our partners include:
works: How it works: You drop it! We clean it! You pick it! The Outcome: “We present You” Rates: Our rates are very competitive in the market.

import: We know how important clean and fresh laundry is, so don’t hesitate to give us a call or book your service online!
